title: 27 die in massive fire in west Delhi building near Mundka station, 12 injured - Hindustan Times
content:
1. 27 die in massive fire in west Delhi building near Mundka station, 12 injured  Hindustan Times
  2. Delhi Mundka Fire Tragedy: Watch How People Tried To Escape 3 Storey Building By Ropes  India Today
  3. 27 Dead, 40 Hospitalised In Massive Fire At 4-Storey Building In Delhi  NDTV
  4. 27 killed, several injured in Delhi building fire  The Indian Express
  5. Delhi Fire News: Eye-Witness Recalls Tragic Event, Relative Trapped In 3 Storey Building In Mundka  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: West Delhi fire: More than 70 people were in the building when the fire started on Friday evening on the first floor of the building near Mundka metro station. Delhi Fire Services (DFS) chief Atul Garg said that the fire control room received a call reporting the fire around 4.40pm
